creditline: Gift of the Estate of Marion Nelson
description: ceramic urn-shaped with pair of handles; cream underglaze with green, black, orange, blue, purple, brown and gilt Deco design at shoulder and handles; percolator insert; metal lid with glass knob; 4-footed metal base and metal spigot
markings: \'EQUIPPED WITH/Gravity Reset/SAFETY SWITCH/TO RESET INVERT/WITH a QUICK MOTION/Royal Rochester/PAT. AUG 12, 1924/108-125 VOLTS/350 WATTS/E630/c-28 3/ROBESON ROCHESTER CORP/ROCHESTER/N.Y.\', stamped, on bottom; \'\'ROYAL ROCHESTER\'/Nº5\', stamped, on side of percolator insert basket; \'Nº75\', stamped, on percolator insert stem
medium: Glazed ceramic, gilt, metal, glass, wood, pigment
object_name: Coffee percolator, from a three-piece coffee service
title: Coffee percolator, from a three-piece coffee service
